2264namespace {
2265class MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator : public LocalSearchOperator {
2266 public:
2267 explicit MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator(
2268 std::vector<LocalSearchOperator*> operators, double memory_coefficient,
2269 double exploration_coefficient, bool maximize);
2270 ~MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator() override {}
2271 void Reset() override;
2272 void Start(const Assignment* assignment) override;
2273 bool MakeNextNeighbor(Assignment* delta, Assignment* deltadelta) override;
2274 bool HoldsDelta() const override { return true; }
2275
2276 std::string DebugString() const override {
2277 return operators_.empty()
2278 ? ""
2279 : operators_[operator_indices_[index_]]->DebugString();
2280 }
2281 const LocalSearchOperator* Self() const override {
2282 return operators_.empty() ? this
2283 : operators_[operator_indices_[index_]]->Self();
2284 }
2285
2286 private:
2287 double Score(int index);
2288 int index_;
2289 std::vector<LocalSearchOperator*> operators_;
2290 Bitset64<> started_;
2291 const Assignment* start_assignment_;
2292 bool has_fragments_;
2293 std::vector<int> operator_indices_;
2294 int64_t last_objective_;
2295 std::vector<double> avg_improvement_;
2296 int num_neighbors_;
2297 std::vector<double> num_neighbors_per_operator_;
2298 const bool maximize_;
2299 // Sets how much the objective improvement of previous accepted neighbors
2300 // influence the current average improvement. The formula is
2301 // avg_improvement +=
2302 // memory_coefficient * (current_improvement - avg_improvement).
2303 const double memory_coefficient_;
2304 // Sets how often we explore rarely used and unsuccessful in the past
2305 // operators. Operators are sorted by
2306 // avg_improvement_[i] + exploration_coefficient_ *
2307 // sqrt(2 * log(1 + num_neighbors_) / (1 + num_neighbors_per_operator_[i])).
2308 // This definition uses the UCB1 exploration bonus for unstructured
2309 // multi-armed bandits.
2310 const double exploration_coefficient_;
2311};
2312
2313MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator::MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator(
2314 std::vector<LocalSearchOperator*> operators, double memory_coefficient,
2315 double exploration_coefficient, bool maximize)
2316 : index_(0),
2317 operators_(std::move(operators)),
2318 started_(operators_.size()),
2319 start_assignment_(nullptr),
2320 has_fragments_(false),
2321 last_objective_(std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max()),
2322 num_neighbors_(0),
2323 maximize_(maximize),
2324 memory_coefficient_(memory_coefficient),
2325 exploration_coefficient_(exploration_coefficient) {
2326 DCHECK_GE(memory_coefficient_, 0);
2327 DCHECK_LE(memory_coefficient_, 1);
2328 DCHECK_GE(exploration_coefficient_, 0);
2329 operators_.erase(std::remove(operators_.begin(), operators_.end(), nullptr),
2330 operators_.end());
2331 operator_indices_.resize(operators_.size());
2332 std::iota(operator_indices_.begin(), operator_indices_.end(), 0);
2333 num_neighbors_per_operator_.resize(operators_.size(), 0);
2334 avg_improvement_.resize(operators_.size(), 0);
2335 for (LocalSearchOperator* const op : operators_) {
2336 if (op->HasFragments()) {
2337 has_fragments_ = true;
2338 break;
2339 }
2340 }
2341}
2342
2343void MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator::Reset() {
2344 for (LocalSearchOperator* const op : operators_) {
2345 op->Reset();
2346 }
2347}
2348
2349double MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator::Score(int index) {
2350 return avg_improvement_[index] +
2351 exploration_coefficient_ *
2352 sqrt(2 * log(1 + num_neighbors_) /
2353 (1 + num_neighbors_per_operator_[index]));
2354}
2355
2356void MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator::Start(const Assignment* assignment) {
2357 start_assignment_ = assignment;
2358 started_.ClearAll();
2359 if (operators_.empty()) return;
2360
2361 const double objective = assignment->ObjectiveValue();
2362
2363 if (objective == last_objective_) return;
2364 // Skip a neighbor evaluation if last_objective_ hasn't been set yet.
2365 if (last_objective_ == std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max()) {
2366 last_objective_ = objective;
2367 return;
2368 }
2369
2370 const double improvement =
2371 maximize_ ? objective - last_objective_ : last_objective_ - objective;
2372 if (improvement < 0) {
2373 return;
2374 }
2375 last_objective_ = objective;
2376 avg_improvement_[operator_indices_[index_]] +=
2377 memory_coefficient_ *
2378 (improvement - avg_improvement_[operator_indices_[index_]]);
2379
2380 std::sort(operator_indices_.begin(), operator_indices_.end(),
2381 [this](int lhs, int rhs) {
2382 const double lhs_score = Score(lhs);
2383 const double rhs_score = Score(rhs);
2384 return lhs_score > rhs_score ||
2385 (lhs_score == rhs_score && lhs < rhs);
2386 });
2387
2388 index_ = 0;
2389}
2390
2391bool MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator::MakeNextNeighbor(
2392 Assignment* delta, Assignment* deltadelta) {
2393 if (operators_.empty()) return false;
2394 do {
2395 const int operator_index = operator_indices_[index_];
2396 if (!started_[operator_index]) {
2397 operators_[operator_index]->Start(start_assignment_);
2398 started_.Set(operator_index);
2399 }
2400 if (!operators_[operator_index]->HoldsDelta()) {
2401 delta->Clear();
2402 }
2403 if (operators_[operator_index]->MakeNextNeighbor(delta, deltadelta)) {
2404 ++num_neighbors_;
2405 ++num_neighbors_per_operator_[operator_index];
2406 return true;
2407 }
2408 ++index_;
2409 delta->Clear();
2410 if (index_ == operators_.size()) {
2411 index_ = 0;
2412 }
2413 } while (index_ != 0);
2414 return false;
2415}
2416} // namespace
2417
2418LocalSearchOperator* Solver::MultiArmedBanditConcatenateOperators(
2419 const std::vector<LocalSearchOperator*>& ops, double memory_coefficient,
2420 double exploration_coefficient, bool maximize) {
2421 return RevAlloc(new MultiArmedBanditCompoundOperator(
2422 ops, memory_coefficient, exploration_coefficient, maximize));
2423}

2488// TODO(user): Remove (parts of) the following methods as they are mostly
2489// redundant with the MakeLocalSearchOperatorWithNeighbors and
2490// MakeLocalSearchOperator functions.
2491LocalSearchOperator* Solver::MakeOperator(
2492 const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars, Solver::LocalSearchOperators op,

2495}
2496
2497LocalSearchOperator* Solver::MakeOperator(
2498 const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars,
2499 const std::vector<IntVar*>& secondary_vars, Solver::LocalSearchOperators op,
2500 std::function<const std::vector<int>&(int, int)> get_neighbors) {
2501 switch (op) {
2502 case Solver::TWOOPT: {
2503 return MakeLocalSearchOperatorWithNeighbors<TwoOpt>(
2504 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr, std::move(get_neighbors));
2505 }
2506 case Solver::OROPT: {
2507 std::vector<LocalSearchOperator*> operators;
2508 for (int i = 1; i < 4; ++i) {
2509 operators.push_back(
2510 RevAlloc(new Relocate(vars, secondary_vars,
2511 /*name=*/absl::StrCat("OrOpt<", i, ">"),
2512 /*start_empty_path_class=*/nullptr,
2513 /*get_neighbors=*/nullptr, /*chain_length=*/i,
2514 /*single_path=*/true)));
2515 }
2516 return ConcatenateOperators(operators);
2517 }
2518 case Solver::RELOCATE: {
2519 return MakeLocalSearchOperatorWithNeighbors<Relocate>(
2520 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr, std::move(get_neighbors));
2521 }
2522 case Solver::EXCHANGE: {
2523 return MakeLocalSearchOperatorWithNeighbors<Exchange>(
2524 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr, std::move(get_neighbors));
2525 }
2526 case Solver::CROSS: {
2527 return MakeLocalSearchOperatorWithNeighbors<Cross>(
2528 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr, std::move(get_neighbors));
2529 }
2530 case Solver::MAKEACTIVE: {
2531 return MakeLocalSearchOperator<MakeActiveOperator>(
2532 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr);
2533 }
2534 case Solver::MAKEINACTIVE: {
2535 return MakeLocalSearchOperator<MakeInactiveOperator>(
2536 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr);
2537 }
2538 case Solver::MAKECHAININACTIVE: {
2539 return MakeLocalSearchOperator<MakeChainInactiveOperator>(
2540 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr);
2541 }
2542 case Solver::SWAPACTIVE: {
2543 return MakeLocalSearchOperator<SwapActiveOperator>(
2544 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr);
2545 }
2546 case Solver::EXTENDEDSWAPACTIVE: {
2547 return MakeLocalSearchOperator<ExtendedSwapActiveOperator>(
2548 this, vars, secondary_vars, nullptr);
2549 }
2550 case Solver::PATHLNS: {
2551 return RevAlloc(new PathLns(vars, secondary_vars, 2, 3, false));
2552 }
2553 case Solver::FULLPATHLNS: {
2554 return RevAlloc(new PathLns(vars, secondary_vars,
2555 /*number_of_chunks=*/1,
2556 /*chunk_size=*/0,
2557 /*unactive_fragments=*/true));
2558 }
2559 case Solver::UNACTIVELNS: {
2560 return RevAlloc(new PathLns(vars, secondary_vars, 1, 6, true));
2561 }
2562 case Solver::INCREMENT: {
2563 if (!secondary_vars.empty()) {
2564 LOG(FATAL) << "Operator " << op
2565 << " does not support secondary variables";
2566 }
2567 return RevAlloc(new IncrementValue(vars));
2568 }
2569 case Solver::DECREMENT: {
2570 if (!secondary_vars.empty()) {
2571 LOG(FATAL) << "Operator " << op
2572 << " does not support secondary variables";
2573 }
2574 return RevAlloc(new DecrementValue(vars));
2575 }
2576 case Solver::SIMPLELNS: {
2577 if (!secondary_vars.empty()) {
2578 LOG(FATAL) << "Operator " << op
2579 << " does not support secondary variables";
2580 }
2581 return RevAlloc(new SimpleLns(vars, 1));
2582 }
2583 default:
2584 LOG(FATAL) << "Unknown operator " << op;
2585 }
2586 return nullptr;
2587}
2588
2589LocalSearchOperator* Solver::MakeOperator(
2590 const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars, Solver::IndexEvaluator3 evaluator,
2591 Solver::EvaluatorLocalSearchOperators op) {
2592 return MakeOperator(vars, std::vector<IntVar*>(), std::move(evaluator), op);
2593}
2594
2595LocalSearchOperator* Solver::MakeOperator(
2596 const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars,
2597 const std::vector<IntVar*>& secondary_vars,
2598 Solver::IndexEvaluator3 evaluator,
2599 Solver::EvaluatorLocalSearchOperators op) {
2600 switch (op) {
2601 case Solver::LK: {
2602 std::vector<LocalSearchOperator*> operators;
2603 operators.push_back(RevAlloc(
2604 new LinKernighan(vars, secondary_vars, evaluator, /*topt=*/false)));
2605 operators.push_back(RevAlloc(
2606 new LinKernighan(vars, secondary_vars, evaluator, /*topt=*/true)));
2607 return ConcatenateOperators(operators);
2608 }
2609 case Solver::TSPOPT: {
2610 return RevAlloc(
2611 new TSPOpt(vars, secondary_vars, std::move(evaluator),
2612 absl::GetFlag(FLAGS_cp_local_search_tsp_opt_size)));
2613 }
2614 case Solver::TSPLNS: {
2615 return RevAlloc(
2616 new TSPLns(vars, secondary_vars, std::move(evaluator),
2617 absl::GetFlag(FLAGS_cp_local_search_tsp_lns_size)));
2618 }
2619 default:
2620 LOG(FATAL) << "Unknown operator " << op;
2621 }
2622 return nullptr;
2623}

2656
2657PathState::PathState(int num_nodes, std::vector<int> path_start,
2658 std::vector<int> path_end)
2659 : num_nodes_(num_nodes),
2660 num_paths_(path_start.size()),
2661 num_nodes_threshold_(std::max(16, 4 * num_nodes_)) // Arbitrary value.
2662{
2663 DCHECK_EQ(path_start.size(), num_paths_);
2664 DCHECK_EQ(path_end.size(), num_paths_);
2665 for (int p = 0; p < num_paths_; ++p) {
2666 path_start_end_.push_back({path_start[p], path_end[p]});
2667 }
2668 // Initial state is all unperformed: paths go from start to end directly.
2669 committed_index_.assign(num_nodes_, -1);
2670 committed_nodes_.assign(2 * num_paths_, {-1, -1});
2671 chains_.assign(num_paths_ + 1, {-1, -1}); // Reserve 1 more for sentinel.
2672 paths_.assign(num_paths_, {-1, -1});
2673 for (int path = 0; path < num_paths_; ++path) {
2674 const int index = 2 * path;
2675 const PathStartEnd start_end = path_start_end_[path];
2676 committed_index_[start_end.start] = index;
2677 committed_index_[start_end.end] = index + 1;
2678
2679 committed_nodes_[index] = {start_end.start, path};
2680 committed_nodes_[index + 1] = {start_end.end, path};
2681
2682 chains_[path] = {index, index + 2};
2683 paths_[path] = {path, path + 1};
2684 }
2685 chains_[num_paths_] = {0, 0}; // Sentinel.
2686 // Nodes that are not starts or ends are loops.
2687 for (int node = 0; node < num_nodes_; ++node) {
2688 if (committed_index_[node] != -1) continue; // node is start or end.
2689 committed_index_[node] = committed_nodes_.size();
2690 committed_nodes_.push_back({node, -1});
2691 }
2692}
2693
2694PathState::ChainRange PathState::Chains(int path) const {
2695 const PathBounds bounds = paths_[path];
2696 return PathState::ChainRange(chains_.data() + bounds.begin_index,
2697 chains_.data() + bounds.end_index,
2698 committed_nodes_.data());
2699}
2700
2701PathState::NodeRange PathState::Nodes(int path) const {
2702 const PathBounds bounds = paths_[path];
2703 return PathState::NodeRange(chains_.data() + bounds.begin_index,
2704 chains_.data() + bounds.end_index,
2705 committed_nodes_.data());
2706}
2707
2708void PathState::ChangePath(int path, const std::vector<ChainBounds>& chains) {
2709 changed_paths_.push_back(path);
2710 const int path_begin_index = chains_.size();
2711 chains_.insert(chains_.end(), chains.begin(), chains.end());
2712 const int path_end_index = chains_.size();
2713 paths_[path] = {path_begin_index, path_end_index};
2714 chains_.emplace_back(0, 0); // Sentinel.
2715}
2716
2717void PathState::ChangeLoops(const std::vector<int>& new_loops) {
2718 for (const int loop : new_loops) {
2719 if (Path(loop) == -1) continue;
2720 changed_loops_.push_back(loop);
2721 }
2722}
2723
2724void PathState::Commit() {
2725 DCHECK(!IsInvalid());
2726 if (committed_nodes_.size() < num_nodes_threshold_) {
2727 IncrementalCommit();
2728 } else {
2729 FullCommit();
2730 }
2731}
2732
2733void PathState::Revert() {
2734 is_invalid_ = false;
2735 chains_.resize(num_paths_ + 1); // One per path + sentinel.
2736 for (const int path : changed_paths_) {
2737 paths_[path] = {path, path + 1};
2738 }
2739 changed_paths_.clear();
2740 changed_loops_.clear();
2741}
2742
2743void PathState::CopyNewPathAtEndOfNodes(int path) {
2744 // Copy path's nodes, chain by chain.
2745 const int new_path_begin_index = committed_nodes_.size();
2746 const PathBounds path_bounds = paths_[path];
2747 for (int i = path_bounds.begin_index; i < path_bounds.end_index; ++i) {
2748 const ChainBounds chain_bounds = chains_[i];
2749 committed_nodes_.insert(committed_nodes_.end(),
2750 committed_nodes_.data() + chain_bounds.begin_index,
2751 committed_nodes_.data() + chain_bounds.end_index);
2752 }
2753 const int new_path_end_index = committed_nodes_.size();
2754 // Set new nodes' path member to path.
2755 for (int i = new_path_begin_index; i < new_path_end_index; ++i) {
2756 committed_nodes_[i].path = path;
2757 }
2758}
2759
2760// TODO(user): Instead of copying paths at the end systematically,
2761// reuse some of the memory when possible.
2762void PathState::IncrementalCommit() {
2763 const int new_nodes_begin = committed_nodes_.size();
2764 for (const int path : ChangedPaths()) {
2765 const int chain_begin = committed_nodes_.size();
2766 CopyNewPathAtEndOfNodes(path);
2767 const int chain_end = committed_nodes_.size();
2768 chains_[path] = {chain_begin, chain_end};
2769 }
2770 // Re-index all copied nodes.
2771 const int new_nodes_end = committed_nodes_.size();
2772 for (int i = new_nodes_begin; i < new_nodes_end; ++i) {
2773 committed_index_[committed_nodes_[i].node] = i;
2774 }
2775 // New loops stay in place: only change their path to -1,
2776 // committed_index_ does not change.
2777 for (const int loop : ChangedLoops()) {
2778 const int index = committed_index_[loop];
2779 committed_nodes_[index].path = -1;
2780 }
2781 // Committed part of the state is set up, erase incremental changes.
2782 Revert();
2783}
2784
2785void PathState::FullCommit() {
2786 // Copy all paths at the end of committed_nodes_,
2787 // then remove all old committed_nodes_.
2788 const int old_num_nodes = committed_nodes_.size();
2789 for (int path = 0; path < num_paths_; ++path) {
2790 const int new_path_begin = committed_nodes_.size() - old_num_nodes;
2791 CopyNewPathAtEndOfNodes(path);
2792 const int new_path_end = committed_nodes_.size() - old_num_nodes;
2793 chains_[path] = {new_path_begin, new_path_end};
2794 }
2795 committed_nodes_.erase(committed_nodes_.begin(),
2796 committed_nodes_.begin() + old_num_nodes);
2797
2798 // Reindex path nodes, then loop nodes.
2799 constexpr int kUnindexed = -1;
2800 committed_index_.assign(num_nodes_, kUnindexed);
2801 int index = 0;
2802 for (const CommittedNode committed_node : committed_nodes_) {
2803 committed_index_[committed_node.node] = index++;
2804 }
2805 for (int node = 0; node < num_nodes_; ++node) {
2806 if (committed_index_[node] != kUnindexed) continue;
2807 committed_index_[node] = index++;
2808 committed_nodes_.push_back({node, -1});
2809 }
2810 // Committed part of the state is set up, erase incremental changes.
2811 Revert();
2812}
2813
2814namespace {
2815
2816class PathStateFilter : public LocalSearchFilter {
2817 public:
2818 std::string DebugString() const override { return "PathStateFilter"; }
2819 PathStateFilter(std::unique_ptr<PathState> path_state,
2820 const std::vector<IntVar*>& nexts);
2821 void Relax(const Assignment* delta, const Assignment* deltadelta) override;
2822 bool Accept(const Assignment*, const Assignment*, int64_t, int64_t) override {
2823 return true;
2824 }
2825 void Synchronize(const Assignment*, const Assignment*) override{};
2826 void Commit(const Assignment* assignment, const Assignment* delta) override;
2827 void Revert() override;
2828 void Reset() override;
2829
2830 private:
2831 // Used in arc to chain translation, see below.
2832 struct TailHeadIndices {
2833 int tail_index;
2834 int head_index;
2835 };
2836 struct IndexArc {
2837 int index;
2838 int arc;
2839 bool operator<(const IndexArc& other) const { return index < other.index; }
2840 };
2841
2842 // Translate changed_arcs_ to chains, pass to underlying PathState.
2843 void CutChains();
2844 // From changed_paths_ and changed_arcs_, fill chains_ and paths_.
2845 // Selection-based algorithm in O(n^2), to use for small change sets.
2846 void MakeChainsFromChangedPathsAndArcsWithSelectionAlgorithm();
2847 // From changed_paths_ and changed_arcs_, fill chains_ and paths_.
2848 // Generic algorithm in O(sort(n)+n), to use for larger change sets.
2849 void MakeChainsFromChangedPathsAndArcsWithGenericAlgorithm();
2850
2851 const std::unique_ptr<PathState> path_state_;
2852 // Map IntVar* index to node, offset by the min index in nexts.
2853 std::vector<int> variable_index_to_node_;
2854 int index_offset_;
2855 // Used only in Reset(), class member status avoids reallocations.
2856 std::vector<bool> node_is_assigned_;
2857 std::vector<int> loops_;
2858
2859 // Used in CutChains(), class member status avoids reallocations.
2860 std::vector<int> changed_paths_;
2861 std::vector<bool> path_has_changed_;
2862 std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> changed_arcs_;
2863 std::vector<int> changed_loops_;
2864 std::vector<TailHeadIndices> tail_head_indices_;
2865 std::vector<IndexArc> arcs_by_tail_index_;
2866 std::vector<IndexArc> arcs_by_head_index_;
2867 std::vector<int> next_arc_;
2868 std::vector<PathState::ChainBounds> path_chains_;
2869};
2870
2871PathStateFilter::PathStateFilter(std::unique_ptr<PathState> path_state,
2872 const std::vector<IntVar*>& nexts)
2873 : path_state_(std::move(path_state)) {
2874 {
2875 int min_index = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
2876 int max_index = std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
2877 for (const IntVar* next : nexts) {
2878 const int index = next->index();
2879 min_index = std::min<int>(min_index, index);
2880 max_index = std::max<int>(max_index, index);
2881 }
2882 variable_index_to_node_.resize(max_index - min_index + 1, -1);
2883 index_offset_ = min_index;
2884 }
2885
2886 for (int node = 0; node < nexts.size(); ++node) {
2887 const int index = nexts[node]->index() - index_offset_;
2888 variable_index_to_node_[index] = node;
2889 }
2890 path_has_changed_.assign(path_state_->NumPaths(), false);
2891}
2892
2893void PathStateFilter::Relax(const Assignment* delta, const Assignment*) {
2894 path_state_->Revert();
2895 changed_arcs_.clear();
2896 for (const IntVarElement& var_value : delta->IntVarContainer().elements()) {
2897 if (var_value.Var() == nullptr) continue;
2898 const int index = var_value.Var()->index() - index_offset_;
2899 if (index < 0 || variable_index_to_node_.size() <= index) continue;
2900 const int node = variable_index_to_node_[index];
2901 if (node == -1) continue;
2902 if (var_value.Bound()) {
2903 changed_arcs_.emplace_back(node, var_value.Value());
2904 } else {
2905 path_state_->Revert();
2906 path_state_->SetInvalid();
2907 return;
2908 }
2909 }
2910 CutChains();
2911}
2912
2913void PathStateFilter::Reset() {
2914 path_state_->Revert();
2915 // Set all paths of path state to empty start -> end paths,
2916 // and all nonstart/nonend nodes to node -> node loops.
2917 const int num_nodes = path_state_->NumNodes();
2918 node_is_assigned_.assign(num_nodes, false);
2919 loops_.clear();
2920 const int num_paths = path_state_->NumPaths();
2921 for (int path = 0; path < num_paths; ++path) {
2922 const auto [start_index, end_index] = path_state_->CommittedPathRange(path);
2923 path_state_->ChangePath(
2924 path, {{start_index, start_index + 1}, {end_index - 1, end_index}});
2925 node_is_assigned_[path_state_->Start(path)] = true;
2926 node_is_assigned_[path_state_->End(path)] = true;
2927 }
2928 for (int node = 0; node < num_nodes; ++node) {
2929 if (!node_is_assigned_[node]) loops_.push_back(node);
2930 }
2931 path_state_->ChangeLoops(loops_);
2932 path_state_->Commit();
2933}
2934
2935// The solver does not guarantee that a given Commit() corresponds to
2936// the previous Relax() (or that there has been a call to Relax()),
2937// so we replay the full change call sequence.
2938void PathStateFilter::Commit(const Assignment* assignment,
2939 const Assignment* delta) {
2940 path_state_->Revert();
2941 if (delta == nullptr || delta->Empty()) {
2942 Relax(assignment, nullptr);
2943 } else {
2944 Relax(delta, nullptr);
2945 }
2946 path_state_->Commit();
2947}
2948
2949void PathStateFilter::Revert() { path_state_->Revert(); }
2950
2951void PathStateFilter::CutChains() {
2952 // Filter out unchanged arcs from changed_arcs_,
2953 // translate changed arcs to changed arc indices.
2954 // Fill changed_paths_ while we hold node_path.
2955 for (const int path : changed_paths_) path_has_changed_[path] = false;
2956 changed_paths_.clear();
2957 tail_head_indices_.clear();
2958 changed_loops_.clear();
2959 int num_changed_arcs = 0;
2960 for (const auto [node, next] : changed_arcs_) {
2961 const int node_index = path_state_->CommittedIndex(node);
2962 const int next_index = path_state_->CommittedIndex(next);
2963 const int node_path = path_state_->Path(node);
2964 if (next != node &&
2965 (next_index != node_index + 1 || node_path == -1)) { // New arc.
2966 tail_head_indices_.push_back({node_index, next_index});
2967 changed_arcs_[num_changed_arcs++] = {node, next};
2968 if (node_path != -1 && !path_has_changed_[node_path]) {
2969 path_has_changed_[node_path] = true;
2970 changed_paths_.push_back(node_path);
2971 }
2972 } else if (node == next && node_path != -1) { // New loop.
2973 changed_loops_.push_back(node);
2974 }
2975 }
2976 changed_arcs_.resize(num_changed_arcs);
2977
2978 path_state_->ChangeLoops(changed_loops_);
2979 if (tail_head_indices_.size() + changed_paths_.size() <= 8) {
2980 MakeChainsFromChangedPathsAndArcsWithSelectionAlgorithm();
2981 } else {
2982 MakeChainsFromChangedPathsAndArcsWithGenericAlgorithm();
2983 }
2984}
2985
2986void PathStateFilter::
2987 MakeChainsFromChangedPathsAndArcsWithSelectionAlgorithm() {
2988 int num_visited_changed_arcs = 0;
2989 const int num_changed_arcs = tail_head_indices_.size();
2990 // For every path, find all its chains.
2991 for (const int path : changed_paths_) {
2992 path_chains_.clear();
2993 const auto [start_index, end_index] = path_state_->CommittedPathRange(path);
2994 int current_index = start_index;
2995 while (true) {
2996 // Look for smallest non-visited tail_index that is no smaller than
2997 // current_index.
2998 int selected_arc = -1;
2999 int selected_tail_index = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
3000 for (int i = num_visited_changed_arcs; i < num_changed_arcs; ++i) {
3001 const int tail_index = tail_head_indices_[i].tail_index;
3002 if (current_index <= tail_index && tail_index < selected_tail_index) {
3003 selected_arc = i;
3004 selected_tail_index = tail_index;
3005 }
3006 }
3007 // If there is no such tail index, or more generally if the next chain
3008 // would be cut by end of path,
3009 // stack {current_index, end_index + 1} in chains_, and go to next path.
3010 // Otherwise, stack {current_index, tail_index+1} in chains_,
3011 // set current_index = head_index, set pair to visited.
3012 if (start_index <= current_index && current_index < end_index &&
3013 end_index <= selected_tail_index) {
3014 path_chains_.emplace_back(current_index, end_index);
3015 break;
3016 } else {
3017 path_chains_.emplace_back(current_index, selected_tail_index + 1);
3018 current_index = tail_head_indices_[selected_arc].head_index;
3019 std::swap(tail_head_indices_[num_visited_changed_arcs],
3020 tail_head_indices_[selected_arc]);
3021 ++num_visited_changed_arcs;
3022 }
3023 }
3024 path_state_->ChangePath(path, path_chains_);
3025 }
3026}
3027
3028void PathStateFilter::MakeChainsFromChangedPathsAndArcsWithGenericAlgorithm() {
3029 // TRICKY: For each changed path, we want to generate a sequence of chains
3030 // that represents the path in the changed state.
3031 // First, notice that if we add a fake end->start arc for each changed path,
3032 // then all chains will be from the head of an arc to the tail of an arc.
3033 // A way to generate the changed chains and paths would be, for each path,
3034 // to start from a fake arc's head (the path start), go down the path until
3035 // the tail of an arc, and go to the next arc until we return on the fake arc,
3036 // enqueuing the [head, tail] chains as we go.
3037 // In turn, to do that, we need to know which arc to go to.
3038 // If we sort all heads and tails by index in two separate arrays,
3039 // the head_index and tail_index at the same rank are such that
3040 // [head_index, tail_index] is a chain. Moreover, the arc that must be visited
3041 // after head_index's arc is tail_index's arc.
3042
3043 // Add a fake end->start arc for each path.
3044 for (const int path : changed_paths_) {
3045 const auto [start_index, end_index] = path_state_->CommittedPathRange(path);
3046 tail_head_indices_.push_back({end_index - 1, start_index});
3047 }
3048
3049 // Generate pairs (tail_index, arc) and (head_index, arc) for all arcs,
3050 // sort those pairs by index.
3051 const int num_arc_indices = tail_head_indices_.size();
3052 arcs_by_tail_index_.resize(num_arc_indices);
3053 arcs_by_head_index_.resize(num_arc_indices);
3054 for (int i = 0; i < num_arc_indices; ++i) {
3055 arcs_by_tail_index_[i] = {tail_head_indices_[i].tail_index, i};
3056 arcs_by_head_index_[i] = {tail_head_indices_[i].head_index, i};
3057 }
3058 std::sort(arcs_by_tail_index_.begin(), arcs_by_tail_index_.end());
3059 std::sort(arcs_by_head_index_.begin(), arcs_by_head_index_.end());
3060 // Generate the map from arc to next arc in path.
3061 next_arc_.resize(num_arc_indices);
3062 for (int i = 0; i < num_arc_indices; ++i) {
3063 next_arc_[arcs_by_head_index_[i].arc] = arcs_by_tail_index_[i].arc;
3064 }
3065
3066 // Generate chains: for every changed path, start from its fake arc,
3067 // jump to next_arc_ until going back to fake arc,
3068 // enqueuing chains as we go.
3069 const int first_fake_arc = num_arc_indices - changed_paths_.size();
3070 for (int fake_arc = first_fake_arc; fake_arc < num_arc_indices; ++fake_arc) {
3071 path_chains_.clear();
3072 int32_t arc = fake_arc;
3073 do {
3074 const int chain_begin = tail_head_indices_[arc].head_index;
3075 arc = next_arc_[arc];
3076 const int chain_end = tail_head_indices_[arc].tail_index + 1;
3077 path_chains_.emplace_back(chain_begin, chain_end);
3078 } while (arc != fake_arc);
3079 const int path = changed_paths_[fake_arc - first_fake_arc];
3080 path_state_->ChangePath(path, path_chains_);
3081 }
3082}
3083
3084} // namespace
3085
3086LocalSearchFilter* MakePathStateFilter(Solver* solver,
3087 std::unique_ptr<PathState> path_state,
3088 const std::vector<IntVar*>& nexts) {
3089 PathStateFilter* filter = new PathStateFilter(std::move(path_state), nexts);
3090 return solver->RevAlloc(filter);
3091}
3092
3093namespace {
3094using EInterval = DimensionChecker::ExtendedInterval;
3095
3096constexpr int64_t kint64min = std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::min();
3097constexpr int64_t kint64max = std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max();
3098
3099EInterval Intersect(const EInterval& i1, const EInterval& i2) {
3100 return {std::max(i1.num_negative_infinity == 0 ? i1.min : kint64min,
3101 i2.num_negative_infinity == 0 ? i2.min : kint64min),
3102 std::min(i1.num_negative_infinity, i2.num_negative_infinity),
3103 std::min(i1.num_positive_infinity == 0 ? i1.max : kint64max,
3104 i2.num_positive_infinity == 0 ? i2.max : kint64max),
3105 std::min(i1.num_positive_infinity, i2.num_positive_infinity)};
3106}
3107
3108bool IsEmpty(const EInterval& interval) {
3109 const int64_t minimum_value =
3110 interval.num_negative_infinity == 0 ? interval.min : kint64min;
3111 const int64_t maximum_value =
3112 interval.num_positive_infinity == 0 ? interval.max : kint64max;
3113 return minimum_value > maximum_value;
3114}
3115
3116EInterval operator+(const EInterval& i1, const EInterval& i2) {
3117 return {CapAdd(i1.min, i2.min),
3118 CapAdd(i1.num_negative_infinity, i2.num_negative_infinity),
3119 CapAdd(i1.max, i2.max),
3120 CapAdd(i1.num_positive_infinity, i2.num_positive_infinity)};
3121}
3122
3123EInterval& operator+=(EInterval& i1, const EInterval& i2) {
3124 i1 = i1 + i2;
3125 return i1;
3126}
3127
3128EInterval operator-(const EInterval& i1, const EInterval& i2) {
3129 return {CapSub(i1.min, i2.max),
3130 CapAdd(i1.num_negative_infinity, i2.num_positive_infinity),
3131 CapSub(i1.max, i2.min),
3132 CapAdd(i1.num_positive_infinity, i2.num_negative_infinity)};
3133}
3134
3135// Return the interval delta such that from + delta = to.
3136// Note that the result is not the same as "to + (-from)".
3137EInterval Delta(const EInterval& from, const EInterval& to) {
3138 return {CapSub(to.min, from.min),
3139 CapSub(to.num_negative_infinity, from.num_negative_infinity),
3140 CapSub(to.max, from.max),
3141 CapSub(to.num_positive_infinity, from.num_positive_infinity)};
3142}
3143
3144EInterval ToExtendedInterval(DimensionChecker::Interval interval) {
3145 const bool is_neg_infinity = interval.min == kint64min;
3146 const bool is_pos_infinity = interval.max == kint64max;
3147 return {is_neg_infinity ? 0 : interval.min, is_neg_infinity ? 1 : 0,
3148 is_pos_infinity ? 0 : interval.max, is_pos_infinity ? 1 : 0};
3149}
3150
3151std::vector<EInterval> ToExtendedIntervals(
3152 const std::vector<DimensionChecker::Interval>& intervals) {
3153 std::vector<EInterval> extended_intervals;
3154 extended_intervals.reserve(intervals.size());
3155 for (const auto& interval : intervals) {
3156 extended_intervals.push_back(ToExtendedInterval(interval));
3157 }
3158 return extended_intervals;
3159}
3160} // namespace
3161
3162DimensionChecker::DimensionChecker(
3163 const PathState* path_state, std::vector<Interval> path_capacity,
3164 std::vector<int> path_class,
3165 std::vector<std::function<Interval(int64_t, int64_t)>>
3166 demand_per_path_class,
3167 std::vector<Interval> node_capacity, int min_range_size_for_riq)
3168 : path_state_(path_state),
3169 path_capacity_(ToExtendedIntervals(path_capacity)),
3170 path_class_(std::move(path_class)),
3171 demand_per_path_class_(std::move(demand_per_path_class)),
3172 node_capacity_(ToExtendedIntervals(node_capacity)),
3173 index_(path_state_->NumNodes(), 0),
3174 maximum_riq_layer_size_(std::max(
3175 16, 4 * path_state_->NumNodes())), // 16 and 4 are arbitrary.
3176 min_range_size_for_riq_(min_range_size_for_riq) {
3177 const int num_nodes = path_state_->NumNodes();
3178 cached_demand_.resize(num_nodes);
3179 const int num_paths = path_state_->NumPaths();
3180 DCHECK_EQ(num_paths, path_capacity_.size());
3181 DCHECK_EQ(num_paths, path_class_.size());
3182 const int maximum_riq_exponent = MostSignificantBitPosition32(num_nodes);
3183 forwards_demand_sums_riq_.resize(maximum_riq_exponent + 1);
3184 forwards_node_capacity_riq_.resize(maximum_riq_exponent + 1);
3185 backwards_node_capacity_riq_.resize(maximum_riq_exponent + 1);
3186 FullCommit();
3187}
3188
3189bool DimensionChecker::Check() const {
3190 if (path_state_->IsInvalid()) return true;
3191 for (const int path : path_state_->ChangedPaths()) {
3192 const EInterval path_capacity = path_capacity_[path];
3193 const int path_class = path_class_[path];
3194 // Loop invariant: except for the first chain, cumul represents the cumul
3195 // state of the last node of the previous chain, and it is nonempty.
3196 int prev_node = path_state_->Start(path);
3197 EInterval cumul = Intersect(node_capacity_[prev_node], path_capacity);
3198 if (IsEmpty(cumul)) return false;
3199
3200 for (const auto chain : path_state_->Chains(path)) {
3201 const int first_node = chain.First();
3202 const int last_node = chain.Last();
3203
3204 if (prev_node != first_node) {
3205 // Bring cumul state from last node of previous chain to first node of
3206 // current chain.
3207 const EInterval demand = ToExtendedInterval(
3208 demand_per_path_class_[path_class](prev_node, first_node));
3209 cumul += demand;
3210 cumul = Intersect(cumul, path_capacity);
3211 cumul = Intersect(cumul, node_capacity_[first_node]);
3212 if (IsEmpty(cumul)) return false;
3213 prev_node = first_node;
3214 }
3215
3216 // Bring cumul state from first node to last node of the current chain.
3217 const int first_index = index_[first_node];
3218 const int last_index = index_[last_node];
3219 const int chain_path = path_state_->Path(first_node);
3220 const int chain_path_class =
3221 chain_path == -1 ? -1 : path_class_[chain_path];
3222 // Use a RIQ if the chain size is large enough;
3223 // the optimal size was found with the associated benchmark in tests,
3224 // in particular BM_DimensionChecker<ChangeSparsity::kSparse, *>.
3225 const bool chain_is_cached = chain_path_class == path_class;
3226 if (last_index - first_index > min_range_size_for_riq_ &&
3227 chain_is_cached) {
3228 // Propagate only node capacity from chain to first node.
3229 cumul = Intersect(
3230 cumul, FirstIndexCumulsFromNodeCapacities(first_index, last_index));
3231 cumul = Intersect(cumul, FirstIndexCumulsFromPathCapacity(
3232 first_index, last_index, path_capacity));
3233 if (IsEmpty(cumul)) return false;
3234
3235 // Transit to last node.
3236 cumul += TotalTransit(first_index, last_index);
3237
3238 // Propagate node and path capacity from chain to last node.
3239 cumul = Intersect(
3240 cumul, LastIndexCumulsFromNodeCapacities(first_index, last_index));
3241 if (IsEmpty(cumul)) return false;
3242 prev_node = chain.Last();
3243 } else {
3244 for (const int node : chain.WithoutFirstNode()) {
3245 const EInterval demand =
3246 chain_is_cached
3247 ? cached_demand_[prev_node]
3248 : ToExtendedInterval(
3249 demand_per_path_class_[path_class](prev_node, node));
3250 cumul += demand;
3251 cumul = Intersect(cumul, node_capacity_[node]);
3252 cumul = Intersect(cumul, path_capacity);
3253 if (IsEmpty(cumul)) return false;
3254 prev_node = node;
3255 }
3256 }
3257 }
3258 }
3259 return true;
3260}
3261
3262void DimensionChecker::Commit() {
3263 const int current_layer_size = forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].size();
3264 int change_size = path_state_->ChangedPaths().size();
3265 for (const int path : path_state_->ChangedPaths()) {
3266 for (const auto chain : path_state_->Chains(path)) {
3267 change_size += chain.NumNodes();
3268 }
3269 }
3270 if (current_layer_size + change_size <= maximum_riq_layer_size_) {
3271 IncrementalCommit();
3272 } else {
3273 FullCommit();
3274 }
3275}
3276
3277void DimensionChecker::IncrementalCommit() {
3278 for (const int path : path_state_->ChangedPaths()) {
3279 const int begin_index = forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].size();
3280 AppendPathDemandsToSums(path);
3281 UpdateRIQStructure(begin_index, forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].size());
3282 }
3283}
3284
3285void DimensionChecker::FullCommit() {
3286 // Clear all structures.
3287 for (auto& layer : forwards_demand_sums_riq_) layer.clear();
3288 for (auto& layer : forwards_node_capacity_riq_) layer.clear();
3289 for (auto& layer : backwards_node_capacity_riq_) layer.clear();
3290 // Append all paths.
3291 const int num_paths = path_state_->NumPaths();
3292 for (int path = 0; path < num_paths; ++path) {
3293 const int begin_index = forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].size();
3294 AppendPathDemandsToSums(path);
3295 UpdateRIQStructure(begin_index, forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].size());
3296 }
3297}
3298
3299void DimensionChecker::AppendPathDemandsToSums(int path) {
3300 // Value of forwards_demand_sums_riq_ at node_index must be the sum
3301 // of all demands of nodes from start of path to node.
3302 const int path_class = path_class_[path];
3303 EInterval demand_sum = {0, 0, 0, 0};
3304 int prev = path_state_->Start(path);
3305 int index = forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].size();
3306 for (const int node : path_state_->Nodes(path)) {
3307 // Transition to current node.
3308 const EInterval demand =
3309 prev == node ? EInterval{0, 0, 0, 0}
3310 : ToExtendedInterval(
3311 demand_per_path_class_[path_class](prev, node));
3312 demand_sum += demand;
3313 cached_demand_[prev] = demand;
3314 prev = node;
3315 // Store all data of current node.
3316 index_[node] = index++;
3317 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].push_back(demand_sum);
3318 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[0].push_back(node_capacity_[node]);
3319 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[0].push_back(node_capacity_[node]);
3320 }
3321 cached_demand_[path_state_->End(path)] = {0, 0, 0, 0};
3322}
3323
3324void DimensionChecker::UpdateRIQStructure(int begin_index, int end_index) {
3325 // The max layer is the one used by Range Intersection Query functions on
3326 // (begin_index, end_index - 1).
3327 const int max_layer =
3328 MostSignificantBitPosition32(end_index - begin_index - 1);
3329 for (int layer = 1, window = 1; layer <= max_layer; ++layer, window *= 2) {
3330 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer].resize(end_index);
3331 std::copy(
3332 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer - 1].begin() + begin_index,
3333 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer - 1].begin() + begin_index + window,
3334 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer].begin() + begin_index);
3335 for (int i = begin_index + window; i < end_index; ++i) {
3336 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer][i] =
3337 Intersect(forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer - 1][i - window],
3338 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer - 1][i]);
3339 }
3340 }
3341 for (int layer = 1, window = 1; layer <= max_layer; ++layer, window *= 2) {
3342 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer].resize(end_index);
3343 std::copy(
3344 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer - 1].begin() + begin_index,
3345 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer - 1].begin() + begin_index + window,
3346 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer].begin() + begin_index);
3347 for (int i = begin_index + window; i < end_index; ++i) {
3348 const EInterval transition =
3349 Delta(forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][i - window],
3350 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][i]);
3351 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer][i] = Intersect(
3352 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer - 1][i - window] + transition,
3353 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer - 1][i]);
3354 }
3355 }
3356 for (int layer = 1, window = 1; layer <= max_layer; ++layer, window *= 2) {
3357 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer].resize(end_index);
3358 for (int i = begin_index; i < end_index - window; ++i) {
3359 const EInterval transition =
3360 Delta(forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][i],
3361 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][i + window]);
3362 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer][i] = Intersect(
3363 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer - 1][i],
3364 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer - 1][i + window] - transition);
3365 }
3366 std::copy(
3367 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer - 1].begin() + end_index - window,
3368 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer - 1].begin() + end_index,
3369 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer].begin() + end_index - window);
3370 }
3371}
3372
3373EInterval DimensionChecker::FirstIndexCumulsFromPathCapacity(
3374 int first_node_index, int last_node_index,
3375 const EInterval& path_capacity) const {
3376 DCHECK_LE(0, first_node_index);
3377 DCHECK_LT(first_node_index, last_node_index);
3378 DCHECK_LT(last_node_index, forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].size());
3379 // Find largest window = 2^layer such that
3380 // first_node_index < last_node_index - window + 1.
3381 const int layer =
3382 MostSignificantBitPosition32(last_node_index - first_node_index);
3383 const int window = 1 << layer;
3384 const EInterval tightest_sum =
3385 Intersect(forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer][first_node_index + window - 1],
3386 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[layer][last_node_index]);
3387 const EInterval first_sum = forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][first_node_index];
3388 return path_capacity - Delta(first_sum, tightest_sum);
3389}
3390
3391EInterval DimensionChecker::TotalTransit(int first_node_index,
3392 int last_node_index) const {
3393 const EInterval first_sum = forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][first_node_index];
3394 const EInterval last_sum = forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][last_node_index];
3395 return Delta(first_sum, last_sum);
3396}
3397
3398EInterval DimensionChecker::FirstIndexCumulsFromNodeCapacities(
3399 int first_node_index, int last_node_index) const {
3400 const int layer =
3401 MostSignificantBitPosition32(last_node_index - first_node_index);
3402 const int window = 1 << layer;
3403 // Adaptation of the conventional O(1) Range Max Query scheme.
3404 const int right_index = last_node_index - window + 1;
3405 const EInterval transition =
3406 Delta(forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][first_node_index],
3407 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][right_index]);
3408 return Intersect(
3409 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer][right_index] - transition,
3410 backwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer][first_node_index]);
3411}
3412
3413EInterval DimensionChecker::LastIndexCumulsFromNodeCapacities(
3414 int first_node_index, int last_node_index) const {
3415 DCHECK_LE(0, first_node_index);
3416 DCHECK_LT(first_node_index, last_node_index);
3417 DCHECK_LT(last_node_index, forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0].size());
3418 // Find largest window_size = 2^layer such that
3419 // first_node_index < last_node_index - window + 1.
3420 const int layer =
3421 MostSignificantBitPosition32(last_node_index - first_node_index);
3422 const int window = 1 << layer;
3423 // Adaptation of the conventional O(1) Range Max Query scheme.
3424 const int left_index = first_node_index + window - 1;
3425 const EInterval transition =
3426 Delta(forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][left_index],
3427 forwards_demand_sums_riq_[0][last_node_index]);
3428 return Intersect(forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer][left_index] + transition,
3429 forwards_node_capacity_riq_[layer][last_node_index]);
3430}

3465namespace {
3466// ----- Variable domain filter -----
3467// Rejects assignments to values outside the domain of variables
3468
3469class VariableDomainFilter : public LocalSearchFilter {
3470 public:
3471 VariableDomainFilter() {}
3472 ~VariableDomainFilter() override {}
3473 bool Accept(const Assignment* delta, const Assignment* deltadelta,
3474 int64_t objective_min, int64_t objective_max) override;
3475 void Synchronize(const Assignment*, const Assignment*) override {}
3476
3477 std::string DebugString() const override { return "VariableDomainFilter"; }
3478};
3479
3480bool VariableDomainFilter::Accept(const Assignment* delta, const Assignment*,
3481 int64_t, int64_t) {
3482 const Assignment::IntContainer& container = delta->IntVarContainer();
3483 const int size = container.Size();
3484 for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
3485 const IntVarElement& element = container.Element(i);
3486 if (element.Activated() && !element.Var()->Contains(element.Value())) {
3487 return false;
3488 }
3489 }
3490 return true;
3491}
3492} // namespace
3493
3494LocalSearchFilter* Solver::MakeVariableDomainFilter() {
3495 return RevAlloc(new VariableDomainFilter());
3496}
3497
3498// ----- IntVarLocalSearchFilter -----
3499
3500const int IntVarLocalSearchFilter::kUnassigned = -1;
3501
3502IntVarLocalSearchFilter::IntVarLocalSearchFilter(
3503 const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars) {
3504 AddVars(vars);
3505}
3506
3507void IntVarLocalSearchFilter::AddVars(const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars) {
3508 if (!vars.empty()) {
3509 for (int i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i) {
3510 const int index = vars[i]->index();
3511 if (index >= var_index_to_index_.size()) {
3512 var_index_to_index_.resize(index + 1, kUnassigned);
3513 }
3514 var_index_to_index_[index] = i + vars_.size();
3515 }
3516 vars_.insert(vars_.end(), vars.begin(), vars.end());
3517 values_.resize(vars_.size(), /*junk*/ 0);
3518 var_synced_.resize(vars_.size(), false);
3519 }
3520}
3521
3522IntVarLocalSearchFilter::~IntVarLocalSearchFilter() {}
3523
3524void IntVarLocalSearchFilter::Synchronize(const Assignment* assignment,
3525 const Assignment* delta) {
3526 if (delta == nullptr || delta->Empty()) {
3527 var_synced_.assign(var_synced_.size(), false);
3528 SynchronizeOnAssignment(assignment);
3529 } else {
3530 SynchronizeOnAssignment(delta);
3531 }
3532 OnSynchronize(delta);
3533}
3534
3535void IntVarLocalSearchFilter::SynchronizeOnAssignment(
3536 const Assignment* assignment) {
3537 const Assignment::IntContainer& container = assignment->IntVarContainer();
3538 const int size = container.Size();
3539 for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
3540 const IntVarElement& element = container.Element(i);
3541 IntVar* const var = element.Var();
3542 if (var != nullptr) {
3543 if (i < vars_.size() && vars_[i] == var) {
3544 values_[i] = element.Value();
3545 var_synced_[i] = true;
3546 } else {
3547 const int64_t kUnallocated = -1;
3548 int64_t index = kUnallocated;
3549 if (FindIndex(var, &index)) {
3550 values_[index] = element.Value();
3551 var_synced_[index] = true;
3552 }
3553 }
3554 }
3555 }
3556}
3557
3558// ----- Sum Objective filter ------
3559// Maintains the sum of costs of variables, where the subclass implements
3560// CostOfSynchronizedVariable() and FillCostOfBoundDeltaVariable() to compute
3561// the cost of a variable depending on its value.
3562// An assignment is accepted by this filter if the total cost is allowed
3563// depending on the relation defined by filter_enum:
3564// - Solver::LE -> total_cost <= objective_max.
3565// - Solver::GE -> total_cost >= objective_min.
3566// - Solver::EQ -> the conjunction of LE and GE.
3567namespace {
3568template <typename Filter>
3569class SumObjectiveFilter : public IntVarLocalSearchFilter {
3570 public:
3571 SumObjectiveFilter(const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars, Filter filter)
3572 : IntVarLocalSearchFilter(vars),
3573 primary_vars_size_(vars.size()),
3574 synchronized_costs_(vars.size()),
3575 delta_costs_(vars.size()),
3576 filter_(std::move(filter)),
3577 synchronized_sum_(std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::min()),
3578 delta_sum_(std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::min()),
3579 incremental_(false) {}
3580 ~SumObjectiveFilter() override {}
3581 bool Accept(const Assignment* delta, const Assignment* deltadelta,
3582 int64_t objective_min, int64_t objective_max) override {
3583 if (delta == nullptr) return false;
3584 if (deltadelta->Empty()) {
3585 if (incremental_) {
3586 for (int i = 0; i < primary_vars_size_; ++i) {
3587 delta_costs_[i] = synchronized_costs_[i];
3588 }
3589 }
3590 incremental_ = false;
3591 delta_sum_ = CapAdd(synchronized_sum_, CostOfChanges(delta, false));
3592 } else {
3593 if (incremental_) {
3594 delta_sum_ = CapAdd(delta_sum_, CostOfChanges(deltadelta, true));
3595 } else {
3596 delta_sum_ = CapAdd(synchronized_sum_, CostOfChanges(delta, true));
3597 }
3598 incremental_ = true;
3599 }
3600 return filter_(delta_sum_, objective_min, objective_max);
3601 }
3602 // If the variable is synchronized, returns its associated cost, otherwise
3603 // returns 0.
3604 virtual int64_t CostOfSynchronizedVariable(int64_t index) = 0;
3605 // Returns the cost of applying changes to the current solution.
3606 virtual int64_t CostOfChanges(const Assignment* changes,
3607 bool incremental) = 0;
3608 bool IsIncremental() const override { return true; }
3609
3610 std::string DebugString() const override { return "SumObjectiveFilter"; }
3611
3612 int64_t GetSynchronizedObjectiveValue() const override {
3613 return synchronized_sum_;
3614 }
3615 int64_t GetAcceptedObjectiveValue() const override { return delta_sum_; }
3616
3617 protected:
3618 const int primary_vars_size_;
3619 std::vector<int64_t> synchronized_costs_;
3620 std::vector<int64_t> delta_costs_;
3621 Filter filter_;
3622 int64_t synchronized_sum_;
3623 int64_t delta_sum_;
3624 bool incremental_;
3625
3626 private:
3627 void OnSynchronize(const Assignment*) override {
3628 synchronized_sum_ = 0;
3629 for (int i = 0; i < primary_vars_size_; ++i) {
3630 const int64_t cost = CostOfSynchronizedVariable(i);
3631 synchronized_costs_[i] = cost;
3632 delta_costs_[i] = cost;
3633 synchronized_sum_ = CapAdd(synchronized_sum_, cost);
3634 }
3635 delta_sum_ = synchronized_sum_;
3636 incremental_ = false;
3637 }
3638};
3639
3640template <typename Filter>
3641class BinaryObjectiveFilter : public SumObjectiveFilter<Filter> {
3642 public:
3643 BinaryObjectiveFilter(const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars,
3644 Solver::IndexEvaluator2 value_evaluator, Filter filter)
3645 : SumObjectiveFilter<Filter>(vars, std::move(filter)),
3646 value_evaluator_(std::move(value_evaluator)) {}
3647 ~BinaryObjectiveFilter() override {}
3648 int64_t CostOfSynchronizedVariable(int64_t index) override {
3649 return IntVarLocalSearchFilter::IsVarSynced(index)
3650 ? value_evaluator_(index, IntVarLocalSearchFilter::Value(index))
3651 : 0;
3652 }
3653 int64_t CostOfChanges(const Assignment* changes, bool incremental) override {
3654 int64_t total_cost = 0;
3655 const Assignment::IntContainer& container = changes->IntVarContainer();
3656 for (const IntVarElement& new_element : container.elements()) {
3657 IntVar* const var = new_element.Var();
3658 int64_t index = -1;
3659 if (this->FindIndex(var, &index)) {
3660 total_cost = CapSub(total_cost, this->delta_costs_[index]);
3661 int64_t new_cost = 0LL;
3662 if (new_element.Activated()) {
3663 new_cost = value_evaluator_(index, new_element.Value());
3664 } else if (var->Bound()) {
3665 new_cost = value_evaluator_(index, var->Min());
3666 }
3667 total_cost = CapAdd(total_cost, new_cost);
3668 if (incremental) {
3669 this->delta_costs_[index] = new_cost;
3670 }
3671 }
3672 }
3673 return total_cost;
3674 }
3675
3676 private:
3677 Solver::IndexEvaluator2 value_evaluator_;
3678};
3679
3680template <typename Filter>
3681class TernaryObjectiveFilter : public SumObjectiveFilter<Filter> {
3682 public:
3683 TernaryObjectiveFilter(const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars,
3684 const std::vector<IntVar*>& secondary_vars,
3685 Solver::IndexEvaluator3 value_evaluator, Filter filter)
3686 : SumObjectiveFilter<Filter>(vars, std::move(filter)),
3687 secondary_vars_offset_(vars.size()),
3688 secondary_values_(vars.size(), -1),
3689 value_evaluator_(std::move(value_evaluator)) {
3690 IntVarLocalSearchFilter::AddVars(secondary_vars);
3691 CHECK_GE(IntVarLocalSearchFilter::Size(), 0);
3692 }
3693 ~TernaryObjectiveFilter() override {}
3694 int64_t CostOfSynchronizedVariable(int64_t index) override {
3695 DCHECK_LT(index, secondary_vars_offset_);
3696 return IntVarLocalSearchFilter::IsVarSynced(index)
3697 ? value_evaluator_(index, IntVarLocalSearchFilter::Value(index),
3698 IntVarLocalSearchFilter::Value(
3699 index + secondary_vars_offset_))
3700 : 0;
3701 }
3702 int64_t CostOfChanges(const Assignment* changes, bool incremental) override {
3703 int64_t total_cost = 0;
3704 const Assignment::IntContainer& container = changes->IntVarContainer();
3705 for (const IntVarElement& new_element : container.elements()) {
3706 IntVar* const var = new_element.Var();
3707 int64_t index = -1;
3708 if (this->FindIndex(var, &index) && index < secondary_vars_offset_) {
3709 secondary_values_[index] = -1;
3710 }
3711 }
3712 // Primary variable indices range from 0 to secondary_vars_offset_ - 1,
3713 // matching secondary indices from secondary_vars_offset_ to
3714 // 2 * secondary_vars_offset_ - 1.
3715 const int max_secondary_index = 2 * secondary_vars_offset_;
3716 for (const IntVarElement& new_element : container.elements()) {
3717 IntVar* const var = new_element.Var();
3718 int64_t index = -1;
3719 if (new_element.Activated() && this->FindIndex(var, &index) &&
3720 index >= secondary_vars_offset_ &&
3721 // Only consider secondary_variables linked to primary ones.
3722 index < max_secondary_index) {
3723 secondary_values_[index - secondary_vars_offset_] = new_element.Value();
3724 }
3725 }
3726 for (const IntVarElement& new_element : container.elements()) {
3727 IntVar* const var = new_element.Var();
3728 int64_t index = -1;
3729 if (this->FindIndex(var, &index) && index < secondary_vars_offset_) {
3730 total_cost = CapSub(total_cost, this->delta_costs_[index]);
3731 int64_t new_cost = 0LL;
3732 if (new_element.Activated()) {
3733 new_cost = value_evaluator_(index, new_element.Value(),
3734 secondary_values_[index]);
3735 } else if (var->Bound() &&
3736 IntVarLocalSearchFilter::Var(index + secondary_vars_offset_)
3737 ->Bound()) {
3738 new_cost = value_evaluator_(
3739 index, var->Min(),
3740 IntVarLocalSearchFilter::Var(index + secondary_vars_offset_)
3741 ->Min());
3742 }
3743 total_cost = CapAdd(total_cost, new_cost);
3744 if (incremental) {
3745 this->delta_costs_[index] = new_cost;
3746 }
3747 }
3748 }
3749 return total_cost;
3750 }
3751
3752 private:
3753 int secondary_vars_offset_;
3754 std::vector<int64_t> secondary_values_;
3755 Solver::IndexEvaluator3 value_evaluator_;
3756};
3757} // namespace
3758
3759IntVarLocalSearchFilter* Solver::MakeSumObjectiveFilter(
3760 const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars, Solver::IndexEvaluator2 values,
3761 Solver::LocalSearchFilterBound filter_enum) {
3762 switch (filter_enum) {
3763 case Solver::LE: {
3764 auto filter = [](int64_t value, int64_t, int64_t max_value) {
3765 return value <= max_value;
3766 };
3767 return RevAlloc(new BinaryObjectiveFilter<decltype(filter)>(
3768 vars, std::move(values), std::move(filter)));
3769 }
3770 case Solver::GE: {
3771 auto filter = [](int64_t value, int64_t min_value, int64_t) {
3772 return value >= min_value;
3773 };
3774 return RevAlloc(new BinaryObjectiveFilter<decltype(filter)>(
3775 vars, std::move(values), std::move(filter)));
3776 }
3777 case Solver::EQ: {
3778 auto filter = [](int64_t value, int64_t min_value, int64_t max_value) {
3779 return min_value <= value && value <= max_value;
3780 };
3781 return RevAlloc(new BinaryObjectiveFilter<decltype(filter)>(
3782 vars, std::move(values), std::move(filter)));
3783 }
3784 default: {
3785 LOG(ERROR) << "Unknown local search filter enum value";
3786 return nullptr;
3787 }
3788 }
3789}
3790
3791IntVarLocalSearchFilter* Solver::MakeSumObjectiveFilter(
3792 const std::vector<IntVar*>& vars,
3793 const std::vector<IntVar*>& secondary_vars, Solver::IndexEvaluator3 values,
3794 Solver::LocalSearchFilterBound filter_enum) {
3795 switch (filter_enum) {
3796 case Solver::LE: {
3797 auto filter = [](int64_t value, int64_t, int64_t max_value) {
3798 return value <= max_value;
3799 };
3800 return RevAlloc(new TernaryObjectiveFilter<decltype(filter)>(
3801 vars, secondary_vars, std::move(values), std::move(filter)));
3802 }
3803 case Solver::GE: {
3804 auto filter = [](int64_t value, int64_t min_value, int64_t) {
3805 return value >= min_value;
3806 };
3807 return RevAlloc(new TernaryObjectiveFilter<decltype(filter)>(
3808 vars, secondary_vars, std::move(values), std::move(filter)));
3809 }
3810 case Solver::EQ: {
3811 auto filter = [](int64_t value, int64_t min_value, int64_t max_value) {
3812 return min_value <= value && value <= max_value;
3813 };
3814 return RevAlloc(new TernaryObjectiveFilter<decltype(filter)>(
3815 vars, secondary_vars, std::move(values), std::move(filter)));
3816 }
3817 default: {
3818 LOG(ERROR) << "Unknown local search filter enum value";
3819 return nullptr;
3820 }
3821 }
3822}
3823
3824int LocalSearchState::AddVariable(int64_t initial_min, int64_t initial_max) {
3825 DCHECK(state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_);
3826 DCHECK_LE(initial_min, initial_max);
3827 relaxed_variable_bounds_.push_back({initial_min, initial_max});
3828 variable_bounds_.push_back({initial_min, initial_max});
3829 variable_is_relaxed_.push_back(false);
3830 return variable_bounds_.size() - 1;
3831}
3832
3833LocalSearchState::Variable LocalSearchState::MakeVariable(int variable_index) {
3834 return {this, variable_index};
3835}
3836
3837void LocalSearchState::RelaxVariableBounds(int variable_index) {
3838 DCHECK(state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_);
3839 DCHECK(0 <= variable_index && variable_index < variable_is_relaxed_.size());
3840 if (!state_has_relaxed_variables_) {
3841 trailed_num_committed_empty_domains_ = num_committed_empty_domains_;
3842 }
3843 state_has_relaxed_variables_ = true;
3844 if (!variable_is_relaxed_[variable_index]) {
3845 variable_is_relaxed_[variable_index] = true;
3846 trailed_variable_bounds_.emplace_back(variable_bounds_[variable_index],
3847 variable_index);
3848 if (BoundsIntersectionIsEmpty(relaxed_variable_bounds_[variable_index],
3849 variable_bounds_[variable_index])) {
3850 DCHECK_GT(num_committed_empty_domains_, 0);
3851 --num_committed_empty_domains_;
3852 }
3853 variable_bounds_[variable_index] = relaxed_variable_bounds_[variable_index];
3854 }
3855}
3856
3857int64_t LocalSearchState::VariableMin(int variable_index) const {
3858 DCHECK(state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_);
3859 DCHECK(0 <= variable_index && variable_index < variable_bounds_.size());
3860 return variable_bounds_[variable_index].min;
3861}
3862
3863int64_t LocalSearchState::VariableMax(int variable_index) const {
3864 DCHECK(state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_);
3865 DCHECK(0 <= variable_index && variable_index < variable_bounds_.size());
3866 return variable_bounds_[variable_index].max;
3867}
3868
3869bool LocalSearchState::TightenVariableMin(int variable_index,
3870 int64_t min_value) {
3871 DCHECK(state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_);
3872 DCHECK(variable_is_relaxed_[variable_index]);
3873 DCHECK(0 <= variable_index && variable_index < variable_bounds_.size());
3874 Bounds& bounds = variable_bounds_[variable_index];
3875 if (bounds.max < min_value) {
3876 state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_ = false;
3877 }
3878 bounds.min = std::max(bounds.min, min_value);
3879 return state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_;
3880}
3881
3882bool LocalSearchState::TightenVariableMax(int variable_index,
3883 int64_t max_value) {
3884 DCHECK(state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_);
3885 DCHECK(variable_is_relaxed_[variable_index]);
3886 DCHECK(0 <= variable_index && variable_index < variable_bounds_.size());
3887 Bounds& bounds = variable_bounds_[variable_index];
3888 if (bounds.min > max_value) {
3889 state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_ = false;
3890 }
3891 bounds.max = std::min(bounds.max, max_value);
3892 return state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_;
3893}
3894
3895void LocalSearchState::ChangeRelaxedVariableBounds(int variable_index,
3896 int64_t min, int64_t max) {
3897 DCHECK(state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_);
3898 DCHECK_GE(variable_index, 0);
3899 DCHECK_LT(variable_index, variable_bounds_.size());
3900 DCHECK(!variable_is_relaxed_[variable_index]);
3901 const bool domain_was_empty =
3902 BoundsIntersectionIsEmpty(relaxed_variable_bounds_[variable_index],
3903 variable_bounds_[variable_index]);
3904 relaxed_variable_bounds_[variable_index] = {min, max};
3905 const bool domain_is_empty =
3906 BoundsIntersectionIsEmpty({min, max}, variable_bounds_[variable_index]);
3907
3908 if (!domain_was_empty && domain_is_empty) {
3909 num_committed_empty_domains_++;
3910 } else if (domain_was_empty && !domain_is_empty) {
3911 num_committed_empty_domains_--;
3912 }
3913}
3914
3915// TODO(user): When the class has more users, find a threshold ratio of
3916// saved/total variables under which a sparse clear would be more efficient
3917// for both Commit() and Revert().
3918void LocalSearchState::Commit() {
3919 DCHECK(StateIsFeasible());
3920 state_has_relaxed_variables_ = false;
3921 trailed_variable_bounds_.clear();
3922 variable_is_relaxed_.assign(variable_is_relaxed_.size(), false);
3923}
3924
3925void LocalSearchState::Revert() {
3926 for (const auto& bounds_index : trailed_variable_bounds_) {
3927 DCHECK(variable_is_relaxed_[bounds_index.second]);
3928 variable_bounds_[bounds_index.second] = bounds_index.first;
3929 }
3930 trailed_variable_bounds_.clear();
3931 state_has_relaxed_variables_ = false;
3932 variable_is_relaxed_.assign(variable_is_relaxed_.size(), false);
3933 state_all_variable_bounds_are_correct_ = true;
3934 num_committed_empty_domains_ = trailed_num_committed_empty_domains_;
3935}

3939class LocalSearchProfiler : public LocalSearchMonitor {
3940 public:
3941 explicit LocalSearchProfiler(Solver* solver) : LocalSearchMonitor(solver) {}
3942 std::string DebugString() const override { return "LocalSearchProfiler"; }
3943 void RestartSearch() override {
3944 operator_stats_.clear();
3945 filter_stats_.clear();
3946 }
3947 void ExitSearch() override {
3948 // Update times for current operator when the search ends.
3949 if (solver()->TopLevelSearch() == solver()->ActiveSearch()) {
3950 UpdateTime();
3951 }
3952 }
3953 template <typename Callback>
3954 void ParseFirstSolutionStatistics(const Callback& callback) const {
3955 for (ProfiledDecisionBuilder* db : profiled_decision_builders_) {
3956 if (db->seconds() == 0) continue;
3957 callback(db->name(), db->seconds());
3958 }
3959 }
3960
3961 template <typename Callback>
3962 void ParseLocalSearchOperatorStatistics(const Callback& callback) const {
3963 std::vector<const LocalSearchOperator*> operators;
3964 for (const auto& stat : operator_stats_) {
3965 operators.push_back(stat.first);
3966 }
3967 std::sort(
3968 operators.begin(), operators.end(),
3969 [this](const LocalSearchOperator* op1, const LocalSearchOperator* op2) {
3970 return gtl::FindOrDie(operator_stats_, op1).neighbors >
3971 gtl::FindOrDie(operator_stats_, op2).neighbors;
3972 });
3973 for (const LocalSearchOperator* const op : operators) {
3974 const OperatorStats& stats = gtl::FindOrDie(operator_stats_, op);
3975 callback(op->DebugString(), stats.neighbors, stats.filtered_neighbors,
3976 stats.accepted_neighbors, stats.seconds);
3977 }
3978 }
3979
3980 template <typename Callback>
3981 void ParseLocalSearchFilterStatistics(const Callback& callback) const {
3982 absl::flat_hash_map<std::string, std::vector<const LocalSearchFilter*>>
3983 filters_per_context;
3984 for (const auto& stat : filter_stats_) {
3985 filters_per_context[stat.second.context].push_back(stat.first);
3986 }
3987 for (auto& [context, filters] : filters_per_context) {
3988 std::sort(filters.begin(), filters.end(),
3989 [this](const LocalSearchFilter* filter1,
3990 const LocalSearchFilter* filter2) {
3991 return gtl::FindOrDie(filter_stats_, filter1).calls >
3992 gtl::FindOrDie(filter_stats_, filter2).calls;
3993 });
3994 for (const LocalSearchFilter* const filter : filters) {
3995 const FilterStats& stats = gtl::FindOrDie(filter_stats_, filter);
3996 callback(context, filter->DebugString(), stats.calls, stats.rejects,
3997 stats.seconds);
3998 }
3999 }
4000 }
4001 LocalSearchStatistics ExportToLocalSearchStatistics() const {
4002 LocalSearchStatistics statistics_proto;
4003 ParseFirstSolutionStatistics(
4004 [&statistics_proto](const std::string& name, double duration_seconds) {
4005 LocalSearchStatistics::FirstSolutionStatistics* const
4006 first_solution_statistics =
4007 statistics_proto.add_first_solution_statistics();
4008 first_solution_statistics->set_strategy(name);
4009 first_solution_statistics->set_duration_seconds(duration_seconds);
4010 });
4011 ParseLocalSearchOperatorStatistics([&statistics_proto](
4012 const std::string& name,
4013 int64_t num_neighbors,
4014 int64_t num_filtered_neighbors,
4015 int64_t num_accepted_neighbors,
4016 double duration_seconds) {
4017 LocalSearchStatistics::LocalSearchOperatorStatistics* const
4018 local_search_operator_statistics =
4019 statistics_proto.add_local_search_operator_statistics();
4020 local_search_operator_statistics->set_local_search_operator(name);
4021 local_search_operator_statistics->set_num_neighbors(num_neighbors);
4022 local_search_operator_statistics->set_num_filtered_neighbors(
4023 num_filtered_neighbors);
4024 local_search_operator_statistics->set_num_accepted_neighbors(
4025 num_accepted_neighbors);
4026 local_search_operator_statistics->set_duration_seconds(duration_seconds);
4027 });
4028 ParseLocalSearchFilterStatistics([&statistics_proto](
4029 const std::string& context,
4030 const std::string& name,
4031 int64_t num_calls, int64_t num_rejects,
4032 double duration_seconds) {
4033 LocalSearchStatistics::LocalSearchFilterStatistics* const
4034 local_search_filter_statistics =
4035 statistics_proto.add_local_search_filter_statistics();
4036 local_search_filter_statistics->set_local_search_filter(name);
4037 local_search_filter_statistics->set_num_calls(num_calls);
4038 local_search_filter_statistics->set_num_rejects(num_rejects);
4039 local_search_filter_statistics->set_duration_seconds(duration_seconds);
4040 local_search_filter_statistics->set_num_rejects_per_second(
4041 num_rejects / duration_seconds);
4042 local_search_filter_statistics->set_context(context);
4043 });
4044 statistics_proto.set_total_num_neighbors(solver()->neighbors());
4045 statistics_proto.set_total_num_filtered_neighbors(
4046 solver()->filtered_neighbors());
4047 statistics_proto.set_total_num_accepted_neighbors(
4048 solver()->accepted_neighbors());
4049 return statistics_proto;
4050 }
4051 std::string PrintOverview() const {
4052 std::string overview;
4053 size_t max_name_size = 0;
4054 ParseFirstSolutionStatistics(
4055 [&max_name_size](const std::string& name, double) {
4056 max_name_size = std::max(max_name_size, name.length());
4057 });
4058 if (max_name_size > 0) {
4059 absl::StrAppendFormat(&overview,
4060 "First solution statistics:\n%*s | Time (s)\n",
4061 max_name_size, "");
4062 ParseFirstSolutionStatistics(
4063 [&overview, max_name_size](const std::string& name,
4064 double duration_seconds) {
4065 absl::StrAppendFormat(&overview, "%*s | %7.2g\n", max_name_size,
4066 name, duration_seconds);
4067 });
4068 }
4069 max_name_size = 0;
4070 ParseLocalSearchOperatorStatistics([&max_name_size](const std::string& name,
4071 int64_t, int64_t,
4072 int64_t, double) {
4073 max_name_size = std::max(max_name_size, name.length());
4074 });
4075 if (max_name_size > 0) {
4076 absl::StrAppendFormat(
4077 &overview,
4078 "Local search operator statistics:\n%*s | Neighbors | Filtered "
4079 "| Accepted | Time (s)\n",
4080 max_name_size, "");
4081 OperatorStats total_stats;
4082 ParseLocalSearchOperatorStatistics(
4083 [&overview, &total_stats, max_name_size](
4084 const std::string& name, int64_t num_neighbors,
4085 int64_t num_filtered_neighbors, int64_t num_accepted_neighbors,
4086 double duration_seconds) {
4087 absl::StrAppendFormat(
4088 &overview, "%*s | %9ld | %8ld | %8ld | %7.2g\n", max_name_size,
4089 name, num_neighbors, num_filtered_neighbors,
4090 num_accepted_neighbors, duration_seconds);
4091 total_stats.neighbors += num_neighbors;
4092 total_stats.filtered_neighbors += num_filtered_neighbors;
4093 total_stats.accepted_neighbors += num_accepted_neighbors;
4094 total_stats.seconds += duration_seconds;
4095 });
4096 absl::StrAppendFormat(
4097 &overview, "%*s | %9ld | %8ld | %8ld | %7.2g\n", max_name_size,
4098 "Total", total_stats.neighbors, total_stats.filtered_neighbors,
4099 total_stats.accepted_neighbors, total_stats.seconds);
4100 }
4101 max_name_size = 0;
4102 ParseLocalSearchFilterStatistics(
4103 [&max_name_size](const std::string&, const std::string& name, int64_t,
4104 int64_t, double) {
4105 max_name_size = std::max(max_name_size, name.length());
4106 });
4107 if (max_name_size > 0) {
4108 std::optional<std::string> filter_context;
4109 FilterStats total_filter_stats;
4110 ParseLocalSearchFilterStatistics(
4111 [&overview, &filter_context, &total_filter_stats, max_name_size](
4112 const std::string& context, const std::string& name,
4113 int64_t num_calls, int64_t num_rejects, double duration_seconds) {
4114 if (!filter_context.has_value() ||
4115 filter_context.value() != context) {
4116 if (filter_context.has_value()) {
4117 absl::StrAppendFormat(
4118 &overview, "%*s | %9ld | %9ld | %7.2g | %7.2g\n",
4119 max_name_size, "Total", total_filter_stats.calls,
4120 total_filter_stats.rejects, total_filter_stats.seconds,
4121 total_filter_stats.rejects / total_filter_stats.seconds);
4122 total_filter_stats = {};
4123 }
4124 filter_context = context;
4125 absl::StrAppendFormat(
4126 &overview,
4127 "Local search filter statistics%s:\n%*s | Calls | "
4128 " Rejects | Time (s) | Rejects/s\n",
4129 context.empty() ? "" : " (" + context + ")", max_name_size,
4130 "");
4131 }
4132 absl::StrAppendFormat(
4133 &overview, "%*s | %9ld | %9ld | %7.2g | %7.2g\n",
4134 max_name_size, name, num_calls, num_rejects, duration_seconds,
4135 num_rejects / duration_seconds);
4136 total_filter_stats.calls += num_calls;
4137 total_filter_stats.rejects += num_rejects;
4138 total_filter_stats.seconds += duration_seconds;
4139 });
4140 absl::StrAppendFormat(
4141 &overview, "%*s | %9ld | %9ld | %7.2g | %7.2g\n", max_name_size,
4142 "Total", total_filter_stats.calls, total_filter_stats.rejects,
4143 total_filter_stats.seconds,
4144 total_filter_stats.rejects / total_filter_stats.seconds);
4145 }
4146 return overview;
4147 }
4148 void BeginOperatorStart() override {}
4149 void EndOperatorStart() override {}
4150 void BeginMakeNextNeighbor(const LocalSearchOperator* op) override {
4151 if (last_operator_ != op->Self()) {
4152 UpdateTime();
4153 last_operator_ = op->Self();
4154 }
4155 }
4156 void EndMakeNextNeighbor(const LocalSearchOperator* op, bool neighbor_found,
4157 const Assignment*, const Assignment*) override {
4158 if (neighbor_found) {
4159 operator_stats_[op->Self()].neighbors++;
4160 }
4161 }
4162 void BeginFilterNeighbor(const LocalSearchOperator*) override {}
4163 void EndFilterNeighbor(const LocalSearchOperator* op,
4164 bool neighbor_found) override {
4165 if (neighbor_found) {
4166 operator_stats_[op->Self()].filtered_neighbors++;
4167 }
4168 }
4169 void BeginAcceptNeighbor(const LocalSearchOperator*) override {}
4170 void EndAcceptNeighbor(const LocalSearchOperator* op,
4171 bool neighbor_found) override {
4172 if (neighbor_found) {
4173 operator_stats_[op->Self()].accepted_neighbors++;
4174 }
4175 }
4176 void BeginFiltering(const LocalSearchFilter* filter) override {
4177 FilterStats& filter_stats = filter_stats_[filter];
4178 filter_stats.calls++;
4179 filter_stats.context = solver()->context();
4180 filter_timer_.Start();
4181 }
4182 void EndFiltering(const LocalSearchFilter* filter, bool reject) override {
4183 filter_timer_.Stop();
4184 auto& stats = filter_stats_[filter];
4185 stats.seconds += filter_timer_.Get();
4186 if (reject) {
4187 stats.rejects++;
4188 }
4189 }
4190 void AddFirstSolutionProfiledDecisionBuilder(
4191 ProfiledDecisionBuilder* profiled_db) {
4192 profiled_decision_builders_.push_back(profiled_db);
4193 }
4194 void Install() override { SearchMonitor::Install(); }
4195
4196 private:
4197 void UpdateTime() {
4198 if (last_operator_ != nullptr) {
4199 timer_.Stop();
4200 operator_stats_[last_operator_].seconds += timer_.Get();
4201 }
4202 timer_.Start();
4203 }
4204
4205 struct OperatorStats {
4206 int64_t neighbors = 0;
4207 int64_t filtered_neighbors = 0;
4208 int64_t accepted_neighbors = 0;
4209 double seconds = 0;
4210 };
4211
4212 struct FilterStats {
4213 int64_t calls = 0;
4214 int64_t rejects = 0;
4215 double seconds = 0;
4216 std::string context;
4217 };
4218 WallTimer timer_;
4219 WallTimer filter_timer_;
4220 const LocalSearchOperator* last_operator_ = nullptr;
4221 absl::flat_hash_map<const LocalSearchOperator*, OperatorStats>
4222 operator_stats_;
4223 absl::flat_hash_map<const LocalSearchFilter*, FilterStats> filter_stats_;
4224 // Profiled decision builders.
4225 std::vector<ProfiledDecisionBuilder*> profiled_decision_builders_;
4226};

4228DecisionBuilder* Solver::MakeProfiledDecisionBuilderWrapper(
4229 DecisionBuilder* db) {
4230 if (IsLocalSearchProfilingEnabled()) {
4231 ProfiledDecisionBuilder* profiled_db =
4232 RevAlloc(new ProfiledDecisionBuilder(db));
4233 local_search_profiler_->AddFirstSolutionProfiledDecisionBuilder(
4234 profiled_db);

4236 }

4238}
